author: jorton
msg: * build/apr_common.m4 (APR_LAYOUT): Catch invalid layout names which
otherwise cause sed script errors and user confusion a la PR 38209.

author: jeremias
msg: Fixed ugly NPE (with no message) when a malconfigured font was processed by the PS Renderer (even when that font is not used). When the font is used we don't get an NPE anymore but a Runtime exception. Not ideal, but a little better, especially because of the error message. I hope that at some point someone finds time to clean up the whole exception handling in FOP.

author: cdoremus
msg: Modified 'Starting the Portal' section to provide info about adding a pluto role to the tomcat user's record in tomcat-users.xml so Security Mapping Test can be completed successfully.

author: gdamour
msg: We need to set the host and port of the RemoteEJBReferenceBuilder.
